trans-unit.source: Represents a service that can use application context to resolve a provided relative URI to an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以使用應用程式內容來解析所提供相對 URI 為絕對 URI 的服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> implemented as a service enables type converters to use an application-specific context that might be able to complete a URI-type property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> 如服務可讓使用應用程式專屬的內容可能無法完成的 URI 類型屬性的型別轉換子實作。

trans-unit.source: Type converters and markup extensions can query for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior.
trans-unit.target: 類型轉換器和標記延伸可以查詢<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>XAML 物件寫入器叫用的值轉換行為時，會將 XAML 物件寫入器所提供的服務內容上以服務。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類型轉換器和 XAML 的標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[適用於類型轉換器和標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> is not just for value conversion and service context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> 不只適用於數值的轉換和服務內容。

trans-unit.source: Class logic for UI elements or other classes that support containment might also implement <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> services as a recognized pattern that child elements can call for base URI information, or store base URI information that is obtained from XAML parsing of the root element.
trans-unit.target: UI 項目或其他支援內含項目類別的類別邏輯可能也會實作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>服務可辨識的模式，其項目子系可以呼叫基底 URI 資訊，或儲存為基底 URI 資訊是從 XAML 取得剖析根項目。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly PresentationCore.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個介面會存在於 WPF 專屬組件 PresentationCore 中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Example scenarios for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> exist in WPF.

As an example of a value converter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> class can use a relative URI that is provided for properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontFamily%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, if <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> is available as a service on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> input.
trans-unit.target: 值轉換器，例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter>類別可以使用相對 URI，例如提供屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.FontFamily%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，如果<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>上以服務使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext>輸入。

trans-unit.source: As an example of the element case, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> implements <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> so that it can pass through base URI values when parsed, which then modifies <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink.NavigateUri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如此項目的大小寫<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>實作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>，讓它可以通過基底 URI 值剖析時，這會將修改<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink.NavigateUri%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the current application context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前應用程式內容的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the application context.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式內容的基底 URI。
